channel.title: Colors
channel.description: how do i find the colors of the monster i want to kill using an auto fighter?

item.title: Colors
item.dc:creator: @Aftermath_961 Aftermath
item.description:
@Aftermath_961 wrote:

That’s the default hotkey. If people need to know how to pick colors, they wouldn’t have changed the hotkeys.
Using bold makes me feel smart

Read full topic

item.title: Colors
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Aftermath:

He also posted that you could use Ctrl + Alt + P. That’s called new information.

No, the HotKeys may vary on the users SCAR program. That is why i did not include that information.

You can change the HotKeys in SCAR by:
Going to Tool> Redefine HotKeys.

Read full topic

item.title: Colors
item.dc:creator: @dudeofthed dudeofthed
item.description:
@dudeofthed wrote:

Divinity:

how do i find the colors of the monster i want to kill using an auto fighter?

Click on the little Eyedropper from SCAR. It would freeze the screen and allow you to select certain colours, using the + symbol as a mouse pointer.

Read full topic
